current.chk_text: Please note our cases are seriously protective but they do not make your phone indestructible. Throwing, dropping or mistreating phones in our cases can cause cracked screens and internal damage. View our warranty page to see the full details of the product warranty which applies to all Mous products purchased directly through us.

settings.title: Don't just take our word for it
settings.subtitle: Product ratings from over 10K verified customers

settings.title:
Best-in-class
drop protection
settings.desc: Nothing makes your tech indestructible but that doesn't stop us from trying.
We design our cases with long-lasting protection in mind and offer a lifetime warranty to all customers, so you're covered for life.
From a crowdfunding campaign to a global community, we're constantly communicating with real Mous users to stay in tune with what you want.
We're a UK company but we have customers all over the world, so no matter where you are, we'll come to you.

settings.title: Impressive impact materials
settings.description: AiroShock™ has been designed to absorb impact, allowing our cases to be both super slim and extremely protective.

settings.title: Innovative magnetic technology
settings.description: AutoAlign™ is our innovative magnetic mounting system that allows all of our Limitless cases to attach seamlessly with our Limitless accessories.

settings.press_quote: "When it comes to protection… Limitless gets the job done"
"This case is on point in protection and style"

settings.title: Expect more from tech accessories
settings.text: We push the boundaries in design and engineering to ensure people have protection they can rely on.

settings.title: Products with purpose
settings.text: We take a less-is-more approach to design where all the details enhance the experiences you have with your tech.

settings.title: Customer enjoyment
settings.text: We started out as a crowdfunded project, backed by thousands of people who genuinely believe in our products.

settings.slide_text: SHOP OUR SWELTERING, SIZZLING, SCORCHING SUMMER SALE WITH UP TO 60% OFF

settings.name: Giorvi A.
settings.quote: I have a had quite a few phone wallets in the past and none have been as convenient as this one. I love that it magnetically attaches and is super slim.

settings.name: Isaac B.
settings.quote: It’s a great mount and haven’t had any issues with it losing suction yet. The only thing I wish it had was an extendable arm. Definitely recommend

settings.name: Stephen P.
settings.quote: I drive a lot off road and this mount with the mous case 3.0 work literally the best. Completely satisfied and trust me I have had my phone thrown to the floor of my truck with other mounts and this one holds up.

settings.name: William C.
settings.quote: Great screen protector, super easy to install. The tools and instructions are easy to use and understand.

settings.name: Jerry T.
settings.quote: When you buy a Mous case, you are lucky enough to buy into an entire ecosystem of accessories that allow you to be more productive and efficient. The add on wallet is great for giving me options of taking just the essentials when I go to the gym or a concert. Then, when I don't need it, I can shed the bulk. Very well thought out product line.

settings.name: David D.
settings.quote: The Card Wallet is a great complement to the Limitless 3.0 cases (I now own 3 cases and love those too). I use the Card Wallet on the weekends or when running quick errands and don’t want to carry my full wallet. Awesome accessory and love how it center’s perfectly on the Limitless case.
